meta_description: A 2014 brain scanning study published in a prestigious academic journal, the Journal of the American Medical A
meta_title: Is Erotica Bad for the Brain?
title: Male monkeys gave up their daily juice rations to watch pictures of female monkey bottoms. In other words, for monkeys at least, consuming the ape equivalent of porn could be more important than food or drink.

body: Building dependency = "more important"? They get the little bros all boned up and then offer a shot at an inspired wank for a dime-a-dozen juice box and they call it "more important". You try having capuchin monkey blue balls. It's no picnic, I assure you. It doesn't mean it's more important than food or water.
